pages.text: The $(item)Divination Sigil$() is the first of many sigils that you will create in Blood Magic.$(br2)On [$(k:use)], the sigil will display the current amount of LP in your $(blood)Soul Network$().$(br2)Holding the sigil and looking at a Blood Altar will display the current altar tier and the current and maximum $(blood)Life Essence$() capacity.
